meanings.definition: A special offer in which two items are sold for the price of one.
meanings.sent1: I got a twofer deal on shirts at the store.
meanings.sent2: The store was offering a twofer on pizzas for the game night.
meanings.sent3: The twofer on ice cream cones made my day sweeter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a twofer, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The twofer sale was so good, I couldn't resist buying more than I needed.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is two in one or combines two functions or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The pen with a highlighter is a useful twofer for students.
meanings.sent2: The backpack with a built-in charger is a convenient twofer for travelers.
meanings.sent3: His joke was a twofer, making us laugh and think at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise was a twofer of colors, painting the sky beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The new phone case is a twofer, protecting the phone and holding cards.
